headline: The WSJ Dollar Index Rises 0.1% to 101.21
summary: Analyst Rania Gule, from XS.com, writes it has to do with opposing outlooks for the Fed and the ECB.  “It is crucial to monitor new signals from both the Federal Reserve and the ECB to gauge the future trajectory of this pair in the forex markets.”

headline: Opposing Fed, ECB Outlooks Expected to Weigh on Currencies
summary: The dollar weakened against the euro, even as it strengthened compared to other major currencies, amid opposing outlooks for the Fed and the ECB.

headline: Philip Morris to pay $1.2 million to settle probe into flavored tobacco ban violation
summary: The District of Columbia attorney general's office said it had found evidence that SMNA facilitated online sales of "tens of thousands" of flavored Zyn nicotine pouches to D.C. consumers between October 1, 2022, when the ban was enacted, and June 30, 2024.  PMI, which acquired a 90% stake in Swedish Match for $16 billion in November 2022, must now monitor its distributor's compliance with D.C.'s ban quarterly and stop sales of flavored Zyn pouches through Zyn.com and related e-commerce platforms, the AG's office said on Friday.

raw.headline: Philip Morris to pay $1.2 million to settle probe into flavored tobacco ban violation
raw.summary: The District of Columbia attorney general's office said it had found evidence that SMNA facilitated online sales of "tens of thousands" of flavored Zyn nicotine pouches to D.C. consumers between October 1, 2022, when the ban was enacted, and June 30, 2024.  PMI, which acquired a 90% stake in Swedish Match for $16 billion in November 2022, must now monitor its distributor's compliance with D.C.'s ban quarterly and stop sales of flavored Zyn pouches through Zyn.com and related e-commerce platforms, the AG's office said on Friday.

headline: Pound Falls After Weak U.K. GDP Data Shows Economy in a ‘Soft Spot’
summary: The pound fell after data showed the U.K. economy unexpectedly contracted during October, with the currency’s fortunes starting to reverse, Monex said.

raw.headline: Pound Falls After Weak U.K. GDP Data Shows Economy in a ‘Soft Spot’
raw.summary: The pound fell after data showed the U.K. economy unexpectedly contracted during October, with the currency’s fortunes starting to reverse, Monex said.
